HOME.MAIN_TEXT: Digitize your HR processes with Punica's solutions for an easy business life, enjoy!
HOME.TABS.PUNICA_HR_DESCRIPTION: Punica, digitizing business in the world of work with automated features, provides time savings for users and profits for brands. Working with Punica is very easy to digitize challenging HR processes thanks to the user-friendly interface! Discover this convenience for yourself, and get acquainted with the conveniences of the digital world in your business life.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.TIME_AND_ATTENDANCE_DES: Track and manage employee attendance, leaves, and schedules effortlessly, ensuring accurate payroll processing and reducing administrative burden.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.CENTRALIZED_INFORMATION: Store and access all employee information in a centralized platform, ensuring easy retrieval and enhanced data security.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.AUTOMATED_OFFBOARDING_O: Effortlessly track candidate and employee processes through different channels during onboarding and offboarding with an autonomous structure.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.RAPID_REPORTING_DESCRIP: Gain valuable insights into your HR processes through advanced analytics and reporting features, enabling data-driven decision-making and strategic planning.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.SELF_SERVICE_DESCRIPTIO: Empower your employees with a user-friendly portal where they can access their personal information, submit time off requests, access company ve hr department documents, follow announcements and engage with internal communications.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.REQUEST_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Access and manage employee, travel, official duty permits, service, equipment, human resources, production, training and purchasing requests from one place.
HOME.COLLAPSABLE.SOCIAL_ENGAGEMENT_DESCR: You can bring together people with similar interests with tags, organize events with high participation through announcements, and get accurate feedback in a short time with surveys to engage interaction.
FOOTER.KICKSTART_CAREER: Digitalize Your Business with Punica Today.
PRICING.MAIN_HEADER: Punica HR: The Easy Way to Digitalization
PRICING.MAIN_TEXT: Bringing all the convenience of digitalization to your business life, Punica HR offers your business a high efficiency potential with low pricing.
PRICING.PUNICA_PRODUCT_OFFERS: Punica products offer packages that meet every need. Now you can choose the package that best suits your business and meet the conveniences of the digital world with Punica!
PRICING.DIFFERENT_PACKAGES_FOR_DIFFERENT: Explore the packages of the Punica for different needs to choose the best package for your business.
PRICING.CONTACT_US_MAIN: Contact us for a customized Punica for your business!
PRICING.CONTACT_US_TEXT: Apart from the packages we have determined for you, you can create a package specific to your business by choosing among the features and tools for your needs.
FAQ.MAIN_TEXT: You can contact us for any questions, suggestions or solutions regarding Punica, which brings the conveniences of the digital world to your business life.
